title: Battery issue
message:
Hi all, firstly Happy New Year to you all.
Secondly, I have this ongoing problem with an A1502. Unless an orginal battery ( factory fitted) is put into this MBP, it fails to charge any other battery I put in. I have used 6 batteries from different suppliers and none will charge. But as soon as I fit and original battery charges and works fine.
Question is, has anybody swapped the board on an orginal battery to the cells from a " Genuine OEM" battery? Battery count is not an issue where as the power life span is.
Any one attempted this or is able to point me in the direction of a supplier of an A1502 battery that is as close to an original as can be.
Many thanks.
Marc

title: Battery issue
message: I am assuming that no replies means that no one has tried this or that it will not work?

title: Battery issue
message:
Battery pack has a processor and its dedicated memory.
If you disconnect a cell, need to reset the processor...
